elementSpec.desc: identifies any word or phrase which is regarded as linguistically distinct, for example as archaic, technical, dialectal, non-preferred, etc., or as forming part of a sublanguage.
言語上の特徴．例えば，古い，技術的，方言，非差別的，など． または，特定グループでしか通用しない特殊な言葉であることを示す．
identifica cualquier palabra o frase que se considere lingüísticamente diferente, como ser arcaísmos, tecnicismos, expresiones dialectales, no preferidas, etc., o como parte de un sublenguaje.

attDef.desc: specifies the sublanguage or register to which the word or phrase is being assigned
当該文字・語彙の分類．特殊言語など．
specifies how the phrase is distinct diachronically
当該文字・語彙は，通時的にどのような特徴があるか．
specifies how the phrase is distinct diatopically
当該文字・語彙は，共時的にどのような特徴があるか．
specifies how the phrase is distinct diastatically
当該文字・語彙は，社会的にどのような特徴があるか．

exemplum.egXML: Next morning a boy in that dormitory confided to his bosom friend, a fag of Macrea's, that there was trouble in their midst which King would fain keep secret.
